Portal 2 Es lo mejor que eh jugado Se que puedo crear Nivele pero esta Bueno Me gusta :)

PLEASE BUY THIS! There is absolutely nothing wrong with this game, there's some humor to this game, but it's mostly puzzles. I it gets complicated sometimes, so be ready to replay parts of it and look up tutorials. I personally only had to  look up a tutorial once. I especially like the ending and music. I suggest buying the first Portal before you play this one otherwise you wont be able to get some of the references. You don't need to worry about wasting money if it's not on sale, it's worth it no matter what.

Portal 2 is a sequel to Portal, we all know that. But Portal 2 feels really different. Same mechanics, shoot, shoot, portal, portal... But now we have a story, now we have allies and the antagonist speaks to us in a personal way, not the automatic programmed stuff in Portal. Interesting puzzles, good story, and, the best of all, the humor. When C.J. appears...

Despues de haber terminado la historia del juego y haber jugado unas cuantas camaras hechas por la comunidad, debo decir que es un juego recomendadisimo, con una historia mas entretenida que el primer portal sobretodo porque los personajes son mas dinamicos y tienen mucho mas gui√≥n.
Entretiene muchisimo, algunas camaras son rompecabezas muy muy bien pensados.
A alguien mas le sucede que despues de terminar el juego ven cualquier pared y sienten la necesidad de pensar en hacerle un portal? o solo soy yo el loco?

10/10

When I beat this game, I cried.

I have played a lot of videogames, but none have had an ending as good as this. When I beat Fallout 3, New Vegas, and 4, I smiled and said "that was fun". When I beat XCOM 2, I shrugged and said "good game". When I beat Minecraft as a child, I was like "wow!" and moved on. The list goes on. But when I beat the portal series (portal 1 and portal 2, you NEED to play them in order), I cried. 

Don't be sad because it's over, be glad it happened.

Honestly one of the best games I've ever played and a classic. The first time I played this it blew my mind, this game is so fluid and unique. Perfect balance of puzzling, gameplay and story. A must buy,

This is one of my favouite games of all time, and the pc version is the best one out there. This game has great puzzles, great humour, great characters, it's just a great game. You NEED to play it. My only complaint is it's on the short side in terms of how long it is, but everything else about it is perfect, so it gets a 10/10 from me.

Another masterpiece made by Valve. A must-play for players that love a great & compelling story. Playing it solo is fun, gives you mindf***, somewhat educational (physics bro), and it also makes you a critical thinker, due to its challenging puzzles and tests. Playing it with a friend in co-op just extends your experience to a whole new level. Enjoy your mindf*** with a friend, that would possibly give both of you headaches at the end of the session. Anyhoo, if you dont know what im talking about, get this game already.

Just going to preface this review saying i've never played portal in my life the only reason i got htis was because it was a dollar and i was like ehh what the heck. Now that being said this game was amazing there was never a dull moment and the puzzles seemed to get more challenging as you went, making you have a sense of deep accomplishment when you found out how to beat it and got to progress not to mention that for a 7 year old game now its graphics are still amazing i would highly recommened this game no matter what genre you like, this is a classic
